alert.note: Alert for Central Washington; Interior Hancock; Southern Penobscot (Maine) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 06 at 3:54PM EST until January 07 at 11:00PM EST by NWS Caribou
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 7 AM TO 11 PM EST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations between 3 and 5 inches. * WHERE...Central Washington, Interior Hancock, and Southern Penobscot Counties. * WHEN...From 7 AM to 11 PM EST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches. Patchy blowing snow expected.
info.instruction: A Winter Weather Advisory for snow means periods of snow will cause primarily travel difficulties. Expect snow covered roads and limited visibilities, and use caution while driving. The latest road conditions for Maine can be obtained by going to newengland511.org.

area.areaDesc: Central Washington; Interior Hancock; Southern Penobscot
